page.title: 02Trade in Werrington
page.content: There are three groups of shops in Werrington.They range from small hairdressers to supermarkets.Also newsagents,butchers,chemists,off licences,greengrocers and sport shops are here.Most of the shops are family businesses which range from 3-50 years old,some of the shops have been modernised to become more welcoming. The height of business in the week at most of the shops appears to be the weekend period,starting Friday night and ending early Monday morning.The main height of business in the year for 75% of the shops is the Christmas season and special occasions. A lot of the shops(especially newsagents and bakeries)begin to fill up at lunchtime(12-1)as children come out of school.The shops overall get quite good business throughout the year.
